STBLKeyStringList.Text: What to do tonight, what to do... The same thing {0.SimFirstName} does every night. Try to take over the world.
Oh, to hold the entire world in the palm of one's hand... what can't {0.SimFirstName} accomplish?
So many exciting places, so little time. Where will {0.SimFirstName} travel next?
{0.SimFirstName} added a few layers of makeup... just to be sure! {M0.He}{F0.She} even mostly got it in the right spots!
Huh... {0.SimFirstName} is pretty sure that's not what makeup looks like when adults wear it.
Sometimes you have to remind the help that they're supposed to be... well... helpful.

You'll want to journey to the center of the planet in this elegant piece by famed artisan J. Marano. A walnut hardwood inlaid with gold forms the base upon which the globe sits. Bridge the old world and the new, with natural dyes painted over a pearlescent surface. Of course this planet's treasure lies in its liquid core...

Surprisingly, the gilded bed frame of this elegant sleeper is not its defining feature. As you're undoubtedly aware, locally sourced textiles are all the rage in furniture fashion as of late. It just so happens that the headboards are inset with restored wall padding that was reappropriated from the old Windenburg asylum - long since abandoned due to advances in medical education.

You'll find no better sleep than the Maleficent Bedstead. Its understated elegance is second only to the comfort it provides. The padded leather head and footboards are guaranteed to have a timeless appeal... so much so that the manufacturer has issued a lifetime "style warranty", the first of its kind in the furniture industry.

Genre: Self-Help
Author: Alfred the Butler

A who's who of butlers with a how to guide to butlering. Discover the origins of butlering in Windenburg, and how the role has adapted to modern butlering in the 21st century. Inspirational quotes from famous butlers will keep you motivated and moving!
How to Serve and Not Be Served

A triumvirate of The Coalition's finest horologists collaborated to bring you this exquisite timepiece. The spindles around the edge represent the original measurements of time by Neanderthal Sims, in stark contrast to the standard 12 hour intervals we use to track time in the modern day.
Burst, a clock by The Coalition

We may never know which came first between the chicken and the egg, but doilies definitely came from these intricate curtains. As the legend goes, far back in the 17th century Mara S. Doily invited the region's wealthiest socialites to a gala at her mansion in Windenburg in the hope of finding a husband for her daughter. While the event did not unearth a suitable suitor, one fashionable duke offered a princely sum for Mara's exquisite sitting room curtains, as he found himself entranced by their frilly pattern. Passed down through subsequent generations, the pattern eventually made its way to the common folk, who now enjoy it as a fanciful way to dress their plates.
A simpler curtain for simpler times. If it's refined elegance you seek, these curtains deliver it aplenty. Leave the frills for those who need to make a statement; you've already ascended.
A simpler curtain for simpler times. If it's refined elegance you seek, these curtains deliver it aplenty. Leave the frills for those who need to make a statement; you've already ascended.

We may never know which came first between the chicken and the egg, but doilies definitely came from these intricate curtains. As the legend goes, far back in the 17th century Mara S. Doily invited the region's wealthiest socialites to a gala at her mansion in Windenburg in the hope of finding a husband for her daughter. While the event did not unearth a suitable suitor, one fashionable duke offered a princely sum for Mara's exquisite sitting room curtains, as he found himself entranced by their frilly pattern. Passed down through subsequent generations, the pattern eventually made its way to the common folk, who now enjoy it as a fanciful way to dress their plates.
Famous entertainers who called Starlight Shores their home are now preserved in timeless pop art to adorn your walls.
The pen is mightier than the sword, and you will wield all the power when seated behind this stately desk.
Definitely not a door for dorks; the Art Doorco flaunts its playful art deco style to add elegance to any ingress.

An elegant dresser with a low profile. You'll have to fold your clothes as there's no room for hangers, but if you can afford this dresser, then surely you can afford a butler to do the folding for you.
Feel large and in charge with this stand up dresser. With no need to fold, you'll never have any unwanted creases or wrinkles!
A serving tray with room for four drinks.
A short glass, appropriate for juice.

The mantel of this fireplace is actually a piece of the decorative facade taken from the city hall building in Roaring Heights. Originally commissioned as a gift to the city's mayor, it disappeared from his estate following his untimely death. It has since passed through the lucrative architectural black market in search for the right buyer... will it be you?

The Punchinello family is renown in theatrics, and this chandelier is representative of the height of their heyday. Only ten of its kind were made, custom designed to illuminate the foyer of the old Punchinello Theater in downtown San Myshuno. Whereas Patrick Punchinello once dreamed of passing the business to his son, the family ultimately went bankrupt when little Peter failed to live up to his legacy. While the assets of their once expansive properties were liquidated, their memory lives on by giving this regal chandelier a place in your own home.

This evocative lamp invokes the form of a box jellyfish, each leg dangling from the top-heavy mass. Unlike the bioluminescence found in certain species, this particular piece is lit with a standard 60 watt incandescent bulb.
Add some kitsch to your home with Geoff the giraffe; he's the light of the party! It's the greatest lamp base since the nylon stocking clad leg.
When lit, the aroma from this scented candle intermingles with the fragrance of the fresh flowers to create a nasal bouquet for the ages. All you have to do is relax... relax... relax.

The perfectly round base of this lamp is quite perilous, leaving it with a predilection for predicaments. It took seven painstaking hours to simply balance it upright, and another three hours to rebalance it after realizing the bulb hadn't been screwed in. Do not bump the table that this lamp is set upon. Don't you even dare breathe... Just slowly back up, turn around, and exit the room.
Inspired by the designs of classical astrolabes, this mirror will guide you to a beautiful appearance, the same way astrolabes guided astronomers to celestial bodies.

When you look this good you want to show off. Nothing accommodates your self-absorption better than a floor to ceiling mirror. Don't worry - we know about your sharp knees problem and added a low bar to help mask it. Your secret is safe with us!\n\nThis mirror is best suited for short wall heights.

When you look this good you want to show off. Nothing accommodates your self-absorption better than a floor to ceiling mirror. Don't worry - we know about your sharp knees problem and added a low bar to help mask it. Your secret is safe with us!\n\nThis mirror is best suited for medium wall heights.

When you look this good you want to show off. Nothing accommodates your self-absorption better than a floor to ceiling mirror. Don't worry - we know about your sharp knees problem and added a low bar to help mask it. Your secret is safe with us!\n\nThis mirror is best suited for tall wall heights.
Reflect on the beauty of these vibrant star-shaped flowers which are nearly in full bloom... just one bud remains.

A partnership between the senior ranking sewer and weaver within The Coalition bore fruit with the release of this striking rug. Each interlocking cog can be positioned in lockstep to create intricate mechanical patterns sweeping across your floor.
Gears; a rug by The Coalition
Fur so soft you'd swear it was real...
What do you get when dividing by zero? Nothing. And that's just about as much privacy as this metallic divider offers. Thankfully what it lacks in secrecy it makes up for in style.
La Luz is fiercely protective of anything in its possession. Some swear up and down that its eyes shift their gaze when nobody is looking.
Why would anyone create a collection of fragrances that smells like the bathroom? I guess it'll remain one of life's little mysteries.

No longer do you have to suffer through the awkward chair showroom experience. Lisa's Resplendent Receptacle is ordered completely online! The chair's padding is crafted from three unique foam layers. You'll sink into two inches of memory foam, two inches of a latex like foam called Simvena, and two inches of... well, we just don't talk about the third layer.

Aches and pains? How droll! After all, lumbar support is for those who can't afford back surgery. Instead, you'll be pleased to discover that every thought that went into designing this chair culminated in a singular achievement - the most comfortable plush padding for your posterior.

An ottoman conceived for the masses, but ultimately relegated to the elite. Each one made represents over 1000 man hours of work, as the metal frame is hammered into shape on an anvil until the surface is perfectly smooth.
The name of this sofa says it all. So refined, so elegant, so dignified... this luxurious lounger is only intended for the most delicate of derrieres. Absolutely positively no animals allowed.

This coffee table serves as proof that two heads are better than one, as the city's two top metallurgists came together to design the base of this grand coffee table. The marble slab topper is scientifically proven to be the best surface for serving tasty treats!

The mirrored surface of this beverage cart will appear to double the amount of drinks available for tasting, but this is no simple trick of the eye. We guarantee this cart holds more glasses per square inch than any other cart you'll find, hands down.
When placed outside, the true incandescent brilliance of this orrery-cum-table gleams for all to see.

Merry-Simster's Dictionary defines "vainglory" as a display of pride that's excessive or ostentatious. How then did it come to describe this very vanity? Such a name must be in jest; the owner of this piece has no need for other's plaudits.

Trust the French for your vanity table needs. This French Contemporary styled vanity table works well in the common household. It blends seamlessly into the style of any residence from an abode to a villa!
A bell that emanates high frequency sound waves. Butlers are trained to be particularly perceptive to this exact sound.

Rich Sims aspire to have style like you. Poor Sims aspire to have money to have style to be like you. With these windows on your home, you'll represent the pinnacle of the architectural glitterati of wherever you choose to call home.
Research Butler Techniques on Ask Alfred

The household's butler has been released from their position. We at the Windenburg Butlering Academy hope their service met your undoubtedly high standards.\n\nShould you require a butler in the future, please do not hesitate to use your phone and inform us of your intent to employ a new one.

The Windenburg Butlering Academy has an excellent candidate to join your residence as a live-in butler. They will report for work within the day.\n\nUpon your butler's arrival, please assign them a bed to sleep in. Should you be providing private quarters for your butler, you may set door locks for their section of the home.
A butler has already been hired. You may fire your current butler if you desire to hire a different one.

The Windenburg Butlering Academy has an excellent candidate to join your residence as a live-in butler. They will report for work within the day.\n\nUpon your butler's arrival, please assign them a bed to sleep in. Should you be providing private quarters for your butler, you may set door locks for their section of the home.

{1.SimFirstName} seems pleased with {0.SimFirstName}'s evaluation and vows to continue working hard. {1.SimFirstName} will be even faster at performing {M1.his}{F1.her} responsibilities for a period of time.

I can't take it anymore! I QUIT! Never have I been in the service of such a boorish and downright hostile employer. If you care to hire another butler you may call the Windenburg Butlering Academy, but I'd suggest you work on your demeanor first.\n\nOh and by the way, I'm helping myself to a severance package on my way out. Read our contract; it's included in the fine print.
{1.SimFirstName} is slightly irritated but seems to be looking to improve {M1.his}{F1.her} performance in the future to match {0.SimFirstName}'s expectations.

The residence's butler could not carry out the requested task. Please allow time for {M0.him}{F0.her} to complete {M0.his}{F0.her} current task, or provide sufficient facilities for completing the task.
The butler is carrying out this order.
If you must demand that I "get jiggy with it", I will require music playing near a dance floor with enough space for me to "bust a move."
Black & white shows from the golden age of TV.

The Windenburg Butlering Academy taught me one thing well... "No occupation without compensation." As you've let your household bills lapse, I'll now be taking my leave.\n\nShould you get your finances in order, you may use your phone to inquire about entering into a new butler service arrangement.

I regret to inform you that my customary daily remuneration has not been paid in full. As a courtesy I've added {1.Money} to this week's household bills. Failure to deliver on owed wages via remittance will be regarded as an unspoken termination of the butler service agreement.
Click on the household's butler, select the Butler category, and then choose any interaction from within the Assign Task category.
Click on the household's butler, select the Butler category, and then choose Praise from within the Management category.
Click on the household's butler, select the Butler category, and then choose Reprimand from within the Management category.
Click on a Vanity Table and select Play With Makeup.
Click on a Globe Bar and select Ponder World Domination.
Pour a Drink from the Globe Bar
Click on a Globe Bar and select Pour Drink.
Click on a Globe Bar and select Study Globe.
